description: In Microsoft Word 2010: Pathway to Certification, students will explore all the tabs and groups on the ribbon.  At the end of each chapter, students are provided with an opportunity to practice their new skills.  An instructor video is also offered so students can make sure they are following the correct steps.  Students are able to complete this course at their own pace.  After completing this course, students will be able to quickly and confidentially to navigate Word 2010 and be ready to take the official Microsoft Word 2010 Certification exam.
title: Microsoft Word 2010: Pathway to Certification
